page.title: 07VILLAGE ORGANISATIONS
page.content: WOMEN'S INSTITUTE: has its own hall which costs Â£1000 a year to run,raised by their own efforts, 26 members, monthly meeting,classes held in hall. MOTHERS UNION: 9 members attached to church,meet monthly. PLAYGROUP: for pre-school children and mothers,meet Wednesday mornings in Village Hall.Average attendance 8. EDUCATION CLASSES :held in WI & Village Hall. VILLAGE HALL :opened officially in August.Hoping to get Youth club,Badminton & Indoor bowls started.Also library one day per week Darts,pool,quoits,leek clubs organised by the village pubs. There is also a sailing club with clubhouse beside the harbour.
